resources.description: Learn IBM's design thinking framework, a globally adopted approach used by businesses and startups to solve complex problems and drive innovation. This course is applicable across any career path, making it a versatile skill for professionals in any industry.

resources.title: Customer Engagement Fundamentals
resources.description: Gain essential skills for IT customer service and support, one of today's most in-demand career fields. This course prepares you for customer engagement and support agent roles with practical, job-ready knowledge.

resources.title: Workplace Skills - Helping You Succeed at Work
resources.description: Learn essential workplace skills to help you land a job and thrive in your career. This course covers everything from navigating challenges professionally to recognizing and seizing career growth opportunities.

resources.title: Internships - Get a Head Start on Your Career
resources.description: Gain practical guidance on securing and making the most of internships to jumpstart your career. Learn how to explore career paths, develop in-demand skills, and build real-world professional experience as a student.

resources.title: Lifelong Professional Skills
resources.description: Develop the essential professional skills needed to thrive in modern workplaces, from effective communication and teamwork to personal productivity. This course helps you grow into a confident, well-rounded contributor capable of succeeding across diverse roles and teams.

resources.title: Google Project Management Certificate
resources.description: Gain job-ready project management skills through Google's comprehensive professional program, covering essential topics like Agile, Scrum, project planning, and risk management. Learners will also develop strong stakeholder communication strategies, preparing them for real-world PM roles.

resources.title: Google Digital Marketing & E-commerce Certificate
resources.description: Gain job-ready skills in digital marketing and e-commerce through Google's comprehensive certificate program. Learn to manage campaigns, interpret analytics, and execute projects effectively across key digital marketing platforms.

resources.title: DevOps with Docker
resources.description: Learn Docker and containerization from scratch through hands-on exercises from the University of Helsinki. This free, self-paced course covers deployment pipelines and orchestration, equipping you with practical DevOps skills for modern software development.

resources.title: DevOps with Kubernetes
resources.description: Learn how to orchestrate, scale, and manage containerized applications in production using Kubernetes. This intermediate-level course from the University of Helsinki builds practical DevOps skills for real-world deployment environments.
